snippet.title: Jigoku Train Trailer
snippet.description:
Hi, everyone! We’re from Memo's Note!
An indie game dev team, we mostly make games using RPG maker, and we just finished our second game “Jigoku Train”!
Please support us by playing the game and sharing it. And if you'd like to create a playthrough, feel free to share it with us here as well! We love seeing you guys play the game we developed. It has really helped us improve the game and gather feedback from you

Link to the game available here. 
https://memonote.itch.io/jigoku-train

Music By Blue Lava
https://m.soundcloud.com/user-639826435
